name: backbone
subtitle: Backbone
about: Backbone.js gives structure to web applications by providing models with key-value binding and custom events, collections with a rich API of enumerable functions, views with declarative event handling, and connects it all to your existing API over a RESTful JSON interface.

videos.title: Building Dialogs with Custom Regions
videos.description: In this screencast we'll go through integrating a jQuery UI dialog into our Backbone application. You'll see how to create a custom region object with Marionette to serve as a specialized dialog.

videos.title: Loading Views
videos.description: In this screencast, we'll build a fully functioning loading component using Backbone.js and Marionette.js. We'll answer how to handle old views when new views are requested.

videos.title: Hands-on Backbone.js
videos.description: Get up to speed with Backbone to create rich, interactive applications in a browser.
